CharacterProfile.title: CharacterProfile
CharacterProfile.description: Represents a character profile generated and/or customized by the user.

id.description: Unique identifier for the CharacterProfile entity.

userId.description: Reference to User. (Relationship: User 1:N CharacterProfile). The user who created/owns this profile.

photoUrl.description: URL of the uploaded photo used to generate the profile.

customizedProfileText.description: The user-customized personality profile text (if any). If null, the generatedProfileText is used.

creationDate.description: Date and time the profile was initially generated.

lastModifiedDate.description: Date and time the profile was last modified (either by AI or user).

ChatSession.title: ChatSession
ChatSession.description: Represents a chat session between the user and the AI for a specific character profile.

id.description: Unique identifier for the ChatSession entity.

characterProfileId.description: Reference to CharacterProfile. (Relationship: CharacterProfile 1:N ChatSession). The character profile this chat session belongs to.

startTime.description: Date and time the chat session started.

endTime.description: Date and time the chat session ended (can be null if the session is still active).

ChatMessage.title: ChatMessage
ChatMessage.description: Represents a single message within a chat session.

id.description: Unique identifier for the ChatMessage entity.

chatSessionId.description: Reference to ChatSession. (Relationship: ChatSession 1:N ChatMessage). The chat session this message belongs to.

sender.description: Indicates who sent the message ('user' or 'ai').

messageText.description: The text content of the message.

timestamp.description: Date and time the message was sent.

User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the application. This document stores user-specific data like settings.

aiTone.description: The default tone for AI generation.

aiCharLimit.description: The default character limit for AI-generated biographies.

activePersonaId.description: The ID of the currently active UserPersona.

UserPersona.title: UserPersona
UserPersona.description: Represents a single user-created persona for interacting with AI characters.

description.description: The AI-generated or user-written description of the persona.

photoDataUri.description: URL of the uploaded photo for the persona.

isActive.description: Whether this is the currently active persona for the user.

premium.description: Indicates whether the user has premium access.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profiles, including settings and active persona ID.

/users/{userId}/characters/{characterId}.description: Stores character profiles created by the user.
Stores chat sessions for a specific character profile.
Stores chat messages for a specific chat session.

/users/{userId}/personas/{personaId}.description: Stores the different personas created by a user.
